entry.title: Enhancement or Exits to Campaing PCA1
entry.content:
Is there any exit or BADI for the transaction PCA1. I would like to make a field mandatory GPROZGR on initial and second screen.
Took application package from SE93 using the tcode PCA1.
Pasted the application package - COPC in SE90 and got only 2. Will it work

entry.title: BAS on premise deployment errors for recently created projects
entry.content:
Hi All, 

Strangely I am facing some deployment issues using BAS, which is not the case till few weeks before.

error abap-deploy-task ZZ_FIOR_POC An exception with the type /UI5/CX_APP_API_INVALID _INPUT was raised, but was not handled locally or declared in a RAISING clause.
error abap-deploy-task ZZ_FIOR_POC Path /sap.app/i18n is not adressing a simple type (string, number, boolean, null)  .

For the first deployment it is giving above errors but deployment is happening , but can't access the app from FLP.

second time onwards deployment is failing with same errors, any clues are much appreciated.

Thanks

entry.title: Getting 404 error while deploying migrated project from BAS (migrated from webIDE)
entry.content:
hi 

I am trying to migrate project from custom UI5 application from webIDE to BAS and trying to deploy into on-premise system.  Getting 404 error while deploying.

error abap-deploy-task ZXXX Folder view has children and can't be deleted
error abap-deploy-task ZXXX Deletion of MIME-Object failed: webapp/img
error abap-deploy-task ZXXX Folder webapp has children and can't be deleted

Did anyone faced similar issue?

 

Thanks

Shankar

entry.title: Business Application Studio Cannot See BTP Destinations (Platform Issue)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am facing a persistent issue where my Business Application Studio dev space is unable to see a BTP destination I've configured. The destination itself is set up correctly and the connection to my on-premise system is working perfectly, but it does not appear in the Fiori generator.

Environment:

  • BTP Environment: Trial Account

  • Region: US East (VA) - AWS

  • BAS Dev Space Type: SAP Fiori

Summary of the situation:

  1. I have successfully installed and configured the SAP Cloud Connector.

  2. I have created a destination in my BTP subaccount that connects to my on-premise SAP system. This destination has the required properties: HTML5.DynamicDestination = true and WebIDEUsage = odata_gen.

  3. Crucially, when I click the "Check Connection" button for this destination in the BTP Cockpit, the check is successful and returns a "200 OK - Backend is reachable" message. This confirms the entire end-to-end connection is working correctly.

  4. However, when I go into a Business Application Studio dev space and use the SAP Fiori generator, this destination does not appear in the "System" dropdown list.

  5. I have tried restarting the dev space, which did not solve the issue. I then deleted the dev space and created a brand new "SAP Fiori" dev space, and the destination is still not visible.

  6. When I run the diagnostic command npx fiori-tools destination in the terminal of the new dev space, I receive a DNS error:

    npm ERR! code ENOTFOUND
npm ERR! syscall getaddrinfo
npm ERR! errno ENOTFOUND
npm ERR! request to https://.../_.../destinations failed, reason: getaddrinfo ENOTFOUND ...

This ENOTFOUND error in a brand new dev space, combined with the successful connection check in the cockpit, strongly suggests a platform-level DNS or networking issue within the BAS environment for my trial account.

Could you please advise if this is a known issue or what the next steps should be? I believe I have exhausted all possible configuration and troubleshooting steps.

Thank you for your help.

entry.title: Handling Deep Insert with Navigation Properties in Fiori Elements Using annotation.xml and manifest.
entry.content:
I am using Fiori Elements' List Report and Object Page to create new data via API_PRODUCT_SRV using a POST request. Although I have created the data, I encounter an error because it seems necessary to also send the to_Description data. I am trying to send the following payload:

{
"Product": "DUMMY_PRODUCT",
"ProductType": "FERT",
"BaseUnit": "EA",
"to_Description": {
"Product": "DUMMY_PRODUCT",
"Language": "EN",
"ProductDescription": "test API"
}
}

When updating existing data, the Description field appears on the screen, but it does not appear during creation. So, I cannot include the "to_Description" data  in the payload. I believe this is because the Product does not yet exist, so the Description cannot be linked. Is this correct?

Since I am using a standard API, I would like to use annotation.xml and manifest.json instead of CDS View annotations to include to_Description data. How should I write these files?

entry.title: Disable VizFrame default popover on data selection
entry.content:
I recently faced an issue while working with a VizFrame chart in SAPUI5.
My requirement was to disable/remove the default popover that appears when clicking on a data point in the chart.

Viz:VizFrame uiConfig="{applicationSet:'fiori'}"  id="VizChart"  vizType="column" 

After adding this Property, the default popover was removed automatically.

so question is Why Popover is Removed ?
Because in Fiori mode, SAP expects you to use your own popover or SmartPopover instead of the Viz standard one. That’s why the standard tooltip/popover is gone when you add this.

entry.title: Issue with upload:UploadSet in custom UI5 application after upgrade
entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

Recently we have upgraded our HANA system from 2020 to 2023 and found that the issue related to upload. 

After clicking on upload button and attached file, we are getting the below progress bar with pending state though it got uploaded.

 

In our code afterItemAdded we are calling one function and we have set the visibility as false like below 

 

 

How ever still the Progressbar is coming, the same code is working fine non upgraded system. 

Do i need to change any property here to make it work in 2023 version ? please throw some light on this issue.

 

KR,

Anji

entry.title: Changing the Reject Button in My Inbox App
entry.content:
Greetings, everyone.

I need to change the dialog displayed when the Reject button is pressed in the My Inbox App.


My goal is to substitute the original text area for a combo box with options fetched from an OData service, but I'm having a hard time with it.

Every controller and view is displayed in gray, meaning I can't extend or modify it.

I'm using BAS. Someone has any idea how can I achieve my goal or how can I solve this problem?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Error while trying to deploying Fiori list report to ABAP on SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We have created a service binding for a custom table using ADT and subsequently developed a List Report application in BAS. During deployment to the ABAP repository (client 80), we attempted using two different packages — one referring to the super package ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT and the other to ZDEV_EXTENSIBILITY. However, when running the deployment command (npm run deploy), we are encountering the following error: "You are not authorized to create", specifically while the system is attempting to create the UI5 ABAP Repository object.

We have verified that all required developer catalogs and roles are assigned in the SAP BTP Public Cloud environment for client 80. Could you please advise if we might be missing any specific authorizations, configurations, or additional steps required to successfully deploy the application?

Please find the relevant screenshot attached for your reference.

Thank you for your support.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Research and Development SAP Business Application Studio ABAP Extensibility

entry.title: Build Code Is Slow to Load and Won’t Open Properly
entry.content:
When I try to launch Build Code, it takes a long time to load and never fully starts. It remains stuck on the screen shown in the attached image.

Occasionally, it does open, but the storyboard is blank and the Joule tab doesn’t have a place to enter prompts. Is anyone else experiencing this issue? If a solution or workaround exists, please let me know.

entry.title: Run and monitor replication tasks in Business Application Studio (BAS)
entry.content:
Hi,

I successfully  created a replication task in Business Application Studio following https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/real-time-replication-task-using-sap-business-application-studio/ba-p/13515467  and the replication task has been deployed to an on-premise HANA DB. Now I'm struggling with running and monitoring the execution of the replication task.

When I Execute Replication Task from context menu

I find following messages in the output but the activity never finishes and the target table is not being populated.

If I run the very same statement 'call myReplicationTask.START_REPLICATION' in the SQL console of my HDI container, everything works as expected, i.e. I find all relevant data in the target table and inserts / updates are also propagated to my HANA DB.

Also the Task Monitor for Replication Task doesn't work for me

First I receive following error although I'm still connected to cloud foundry according to the cf login page.

then I'm asked  to add the database to the Database Explorer.

But I neither can select the HDI Container

nor can connect with instance type SAP HANA Database

 

So my questions are

  1. Are the context menu functions such as Execute Replication Task or Lauch Task Monitor for Replication Task designed for HANA Cloud only or should this work with on-prem db as well?
  2. What might be missing in the configuration?  Which logs might be worth checking?

entry.title: What end-to-end testing tools are best for SAP BTP (BAS) applications with CDS views and SAPUI5?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) projects deployed on SAP BTP that use CDS views as the data model and SAPUI5 for the front end.

I would like to implement end-to-end testing for these applications. I am familiar with general-purpose tools like Playwright or WebdriverIO, but I am not sure if they are the best fit when testing applications in the SAP ecosystem (especially those with CDS/OData services and SAPUI5).

  • Has anyone successfully used Playwright or WebdriverIO for BAS/SAPUI5 projects?

  • Are there recommended frameworks or libraries specifically designed for UI5 applications?

  • What are the best practices for handling such tests?

  • Any tutorials, examples, or community resources you could share?

Thanks in advance for your insights!

entry.title: Error while using the SAP application generator wizard "@sap/fiori:app generator failed"
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I'm using the wizard to generate a new application from template but at the end, I have an error message :

"""@sap/fiori:app generator failed - env.on(error) An error has occurred, please restart the generator. : TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'sap.app')""

and the application is not created.

I have uninstalled and reinstalled @SAP/fiori:app generator but I still have the issue.

Is there a way to resolve this problem ?

Thank for your help

entry.title: SAP S4 HANA Public Cloud ODATA V4 API throwing 403 error blocked by UCON
entry.content:
We are facing an issue with one ODAT V4  UI type service in S4 HANA public cloud system. Use case is: We have Developed a custom ODATA V4 UI service and created a Fiori elements based UI app in BAS and deployed on BTP Workzone. We have tested this app in Dev system and everything working as expected. But when we transported the same custom service and UI app to Quality system, the ODATA V4 service is throwing 403 Forbidden UCON Blocked error when we try to load the App or load the metadata from browser as well. 

 

Anyone has worked on ODATA V4 UI  API and created a UI app using BTP BAS? Your inputs are highly appreciated. Thanks.

SAP Fiori for SAP S/4HANA

My Fiori Dev space contains SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility as a predefined one, but still getting above error.

entry.title: how to avoid the unnecessary js calls in the sap fiori custom application
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently i have created a custom fiori application using just smart filter bar and smart table. But when i try to run the application its calling so many js files in network calls and because of that its taking time load the application. 

We already have component.preload.js file for our application which is added automatically after creating project in BAS.

Please suggest how can i avoid the below calls.

KR,

Anji

entry.title: "Deploying Fiori apps in BAS: Object name syntax error in ABAP Deploy"
entry.content:
Hi Community,

I’m currently working on deploying a Fiori component from SAP Business Application Studio (BAS) to an ABAP backend system using the "npm run deploy" command. However, I’m encountering a persistent deployment error that’s blocking progress.

error abap-deploy-task Z_SGM_RRB This syntax cannot be used for an object name

I noticed the deployment log mentions issues with .xlsx files not being recognized, so I have created ". Ui5RepositoryBinaryFiles". After including the file there is no error with excel files and they being recognized.

Has anyone faced this issue before? How can I fix the problem, so the deployment succeeds?

Thanks in advance for any help!
